description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军上将，中国现代后勤工作的开拓者。曾任中国人民解放军总后勤部部长、中共中央军委副秘书长、全国政协副主席。他是唯一一位在1955年和1988年两次被授予上将军衔的将领。
description.en: A general in the People's Liberation Army (PLA) and a pioneer of China's modern logistics work. He served as the head of the PLA General Logistics Department, Deputy Secretary-General of the Central Military Commission, and Vice Chairman of the National Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference. He is the only general to have been awarded the rank of Shang Jiang (General) twice, in 1955 and 1988.

nodes.id: 中国人民政治协商会议全国委员会

zh-cn: 中国人民政治协商会议全国委员会
en: National Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference

description.zh-cn: 中国人民政治协商会议的全国委员会，是中国人民爱国统一战线的组织形式。
description.en: The national committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference, the organizational form of the Chinese People's Patriotic United Front.

description.zh-cn: 中国无产阶级革命家、政治家、军事家，曾任中华人民共和国主席、全国政协主席。
description.en: Chinese proletarian revolutionary, politician, and military leader, who served as President of the People's Republic of China and Chairman of the CPPCC National Committee.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中共中央政治局常委、全国政协主席。
description.en: Chinese politician who served as a member of the Standing Committee of the Politburo of the Communist Party of China and Chairman of the CPPCC National Committee.

nodes.id: 中国人民解放军总后勤部

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军总后勤部
en: General Logistics Department of the People's Liberation Army

description.zh-cn: 曾是中央军事委员会的后勤工作机关，负责解放军的后勤建设和后勤保障。
description.en: Formerly the logistics organ of the Central Military Commission, responsible for the logistics construction and support of the PLA.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军上将，洪学智在总后勤部部长的职位上的前任。
description.en: A general in the People's Liberation Army, predecessor to Hong Xuezhi as head of the General Logistics Department.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军上将，洪学智在总后勤部部长的职位上的继任者。
description.en: A general in the People's Liberation Army, successor to Hong Xuezhi as head of the General Logistics Department.

description.zh-cn: 洪学智的出生地，位于安徽省。
description.en: Hong Xuezhi's birthplace, located in Anhui Province.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的首都。
description.en: The capital of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党。
description.en: The ruling political party of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 洪学智的妻子，曾是红军战士。
description.en: Wife of Hong Xuezhi, also a former Red Army soldier.

description.zh-cn: 洪学智长子，曾任吉林省省长。
description.en: Eldest son of Hong Xuezhi, former governor of Jilin Province.

description.zh-cn: 洪学智次子，曾任天津警备区副司令员，少将军衔。
description.en: Second son of Hong Xuezhi, former deputy commander of the Tianjin Garrison, with the rank of Major General.

description.zh-cn: 洪学智长女。
description.en: Eldest daughter of Hong Xuezhi.

nodes.id: 中国人民抗日军政大学

zh-cn: 中国人民抗日军政大学

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在抗日战争时期创办的培养军事和政治干部的学校。
description.en: A school established by the Communist Party of China during the Anti-Japanese War to train military and political cadres.

en: General of the People's Liberation Army

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军的最高军衔。
description.en: The highest rank in the People's Liberation Army.

en: Chinese Workers' and Peasants' Red Army

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在第二次国内革命战争时期领导的人民军队。
description.en: The people's army led by the Communist Party of China during the Second Revolutionary Civil War.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的主要武装力量。
description.en: The principal military force of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国在朝鲜战争中派出的武装力量。
description.en: The armed forces deployed by the People's Republic of China in the Korean War.

nodes.id: 国民革命军陆军新编第四军

zh-cn: 国民革命军陆军新编第四军

description.zh-cn: 抗日战争时期由中国共产党领导的、编入中华民国国民革命军序列的武装力量。
description.en: An armed force led by the Communist Party of China during the Anti-Japanese War, incorporated into the National Revolutionary Army of the Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 1950年至1953年间在朝鲜半岛发生的战争。
description.en: A war fought on the Korean Peninsula from 1950 to 1953.

description.zh-cn: 中国国民党与中国共产党之间为争夺中国领导权而爆发的内战。
description.en: A civil war fought between the Kuomintang and the Communist Party of China for control of China.

description.zh-cn: 20世纪30年代至40年代，中国抵抗日本全面侵略的战争。
description.en: A war of resistance fought by China against a full-scale invasion by Japan from the 1930s to the 1940s.

description.zh-cn: 中国国民党与中国共产党之间的首次武装冲突。
description.en: The first armed conflict between the Kuomintang and the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国工农红军早期的一支主要部队。
description.en: A major early unit of the Chinese Workers' and Peasants' Red Army.

description.zh-cn: 中国工农红军第四方面军下辖的主力部队之一。
description.en: One of the main forces under the Fourth Front Army of the Chinese Workers' and Peasants' Red Army.

description.zh-cn: 中国工农红军进行的一次大规模军事转移。
description.en: A large-scale military retreat undertaken by the Chinese Workers' and Peasants' Red Army.

description.zh-cn: 1959年中共中央在庐山举行的会议，会上彭德怀等人因批评“大跃进”而遭到错误批判。
description.en: A meeting held by the CCP Central Committee in Lushan in 1959, where Peng Dehuai and others were wrongly criticized for their criticism of the Great Leap Forward.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国元帅，曾任国防部长、中国人民志愿军司令员兼政治委员。在1959年庐山会议上受到错误批判。
description.en: A Marshal of the People's Republic of China, who served as Minister of National Defense and Commander and Political Commissar of the Chinese People's Volunteer Army. He was wrongly criticized at the 1959 Lushan Conference.

description.zh-cn: 1966年至1976年在中国发生的一场政治运动。
description.en: A political movement that took place in China from 1966 to 1976.

en: Central Military Commission of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党的最高军事领导机构。
description.en: The highest military leading body of the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 1929年由中国共产党在河南商城南部、安徽金寨地区领导的农民武装起义。
description.en: A peasant armed uprising led by the Communist Party of China in 1929 in the southern part of Shangcheng County, Henan, and the Jinzhai area of Anhui.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党早期领导人之一，红四方面军的主要领导人。
description.en: One of the early leaders of the Communist Party of China and a main leader of the Fourth Front Army.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党、中国人民解放军和中华人民共和国的主要缔造者和领导人。
description.en: The main founder and leader of the Communist Party of China, the People's Liberation Army, and the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 新四军第三师参谋长，阵亡后由洪学智接任其职务。
description.en: Chief of Staff of the 3rd Division of the New Fourth Army, whose position was taken over by Hong Xuezhi after he was killed in action.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军大将，曾任新四军第三师师长，是洪学智的上级。
description.en: A Senior General in the People's Liberation Army, former commander of the 3rd Division of the New Fourth Army, and Hong Xuezhi's superior.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国元帅，曾任东北民主联军总司令，是洪学智在解放战争时期的上级。
description.en: A Marshal of the People's Republic of China, former Commander-in-Chief of the Northeast Democratic United Army, and Hong Xuezhi's superior during the Liberation War.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军将领，洪学智在东北民主联军第六纵队司令员职位上的前任。
description.en: A general in the People's Liberation Army, predecessor to Hong Xuezhi as commander of the 6th Column of the Northeast Democratic United Army.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国早期主要领导人之一，曾任东北民主联军副政委。
description.en: One of the early main leaders of the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China, who served as Deputy Political Commissar of the Northeast Democratic United Army.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国及中华人民共和国军事将领、政治人物。在平津战役中率部接受和平改编。
description.en: A military general and political figure in the Republic of China and the People's Republic of China. He led his troops to accept a peaceful reorganization during the Pingjin Campaign.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军上将，洪学智在东北民主联军第六纵队司令员职位上的继任者。
description.en: A general in the People's Liberation Army, successor to Hong Xuezhi as commander of the 6th Column of the Northeast Democratic United Army.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国吉林省的省级国家行政机关。
description.en: The provincial-level state administrative organ of Jilin Province, People's Republic of China.

en: Law Committee of the National People's Congress

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国全国人民代表大会的专门委员会之一。
description.en: One of the special committees of the National People's Congress of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军在天津市设立的军队一级组织，隶属中央军委国防动员部和中共天津市委。
description.en: A primary-level military organization established by the PLA in Tianjin, subordinate to the National Defense Mobilization Department of the Central Military Commission and the Tianjin Municipal Committee of the CPC.

relationships.target: 中国人民政治协商会议全国委员会

description.zh-cn: 洪学智于1990年3月至1998年3月担任第七届和第八届全国政协副主席。
description.en: Hong Xuezhi served as the Vice Chairman of the 7th and 8th National Committee of the CPPCC from March 1990 to March 1998.

position.en: Vice Chairman of the CPPCC National Committee

description.zh-cn: 在李先念担任全国政协主席期间，洪学智担任副主席。
description.en: While Li Xiannian was the Chairman of the CPPCC National Committee, Hong Xuezhi served as a Vice Chairman.

position.en: Vice Chairman of the CPPCC National Committee

description.zh-cn: 在李瑞环担任全国政协主席期间，洪学智担任副主席。
description.en: While Li Ruihuan was the Chairman of the CPPCC National Committee, Hong Xuezhi served as a Vice Chairman.

relationships.target: 中国人民解放军总后勤部

description.zh-cn: 洪学智曾两次担任总后勤部部长（1957-1959, 1980-1987），并在第二次任职期间兼任政治委员。
description.en: Hong Xuezhi served as the Director of the General Logistics Department twice (1957-1959, 1980-1987), and also served as its Political Commissar during his second term.

description.zh-cn: 1980年1月，洪学智接替张震担任中国人民解放军总后勤部部长。
description.en: In January 1980, Hong Xuezhi succeeded Zhang Zhen as the Director of the PLA General Logistics Department.

description.zh-cn: 1987年11月，赵南起接替洪学智担任中国人民解放军总后勤部部长。
description.en: In November 1987, Zhao Nanqi succeeded Hong Xuezhi as the Director of the PLA General Logistics Department.

description.zh-cn: 洪学智出生于安徽省金寨县（原属河南省商城县）。
description.en: Hong Xuezhi was born in Jinzhai County, Anhui Province (formerly part of Shangcheng County, Henan Province).

description.zh-cn: 洪学智于1929年5月加入中国共产党。
description.en: Hong Xuezhi joined the Communist Party of China in May 1929.

relationships.target: 中国人民抗日军政大学

description.zh-cn: 1936年，洪学智到达陕北后，入抗日军政大学学习。
description.en: In 1936, after arriving in northern Shaanxi, Hong Xuezhi enrolled in the Counter-Japanese Military and Political University.

relationships.target: 中国人民抗日军政大学

position.zh-cn: 支队长、副大队长、副校长
position.en: Detachment Commander, Deputy Battalion Commander, Vice President

description.zh-cn: 抗日战争爆发后，洪学智在抗大历任第三大队一支队支队长、第四大队副大队长及第五分校副校长等职。
description.en: After the outbreak of the Anti-Japanese War, Hong Xuezhi held various positions at the university, including Detachment Commander of the 1st Detachment of the 3rd Battalion, Deputy Battalion Commander of the 4th Battalion, and Vice President of the 5th Branch School.

position.zh-cn: 副司令员兼后方勤务司令部司令员
position.en: Deputy Commander and Commander of the Rear Services Command

description.zh-cn: 朝鲜战争期间，洪学智任中国人民志愿军副司令员，后兼任后方勤务司令部司令员，负责后勤工作。
description.en: During the Korean War, Hong Xuezhi served as the Deputy Commander of the Chinese People's Volunteer Army and later concurrently as the Commander of the Rear Services Command, in charge of logistics.

description.zh-cn: 洪学智作为中国人民志愿军副司令员兼后勤司令员参与了朝鲜战争，其建立的“钢铁运输线”为战争胜利提供了关键保障。
description.en: As Deputy Commander and Logistics Commander of the Chinese People's Volunteer Army, Hong Xuezhi participated in the Korean War. The 'Iron and Steel Transportation Line' he established provided crucial support for the war's victory.

description.zh-cn: 因在1959年庐山会议上支持彭德怀，洪学智被划为“彭、黄、张、周”反党集团成员并被撤销总后勤部部长职务，下放地方工作。
description.en: For supporting Peng Dehuai at the 1959 Lushan Conference, Hong Xuezhi was labeled a member of the 'Peng, Huang, Zhang, Zhou' anti-Party clique, dismissed from his post as Director of the General Logistics Department, and sent down to a local post.

description.zh-cn: 彭德怀在1959年庐山会议上因批评“大跃进”政策而遭到错误批判并被免职。
description.en: At the 1959 Lushan Conference, Peng Dehuai was wrongly criticized and dismissed from office for criticizing the Great Leap Forward policy.

description.zh-cn: 在文化大革命期间，洪学智遭受磨难和批斗，并被下放至农场进行劳动改造。
description.en: During the Cultural Revolution, Hong Xuezhi suffered hardships and was subjected to struggle sessions, and was sent down to a farm for labor reform.

description.zh-cn: 洪学智曾任中共中央军委委员，并于1982年至1989年间担任副秘书长。
description.en: Hong Xuezhi served as a member of the CCP Central Military Commission and was its Deputy Secretary-General from 1982 to 1989.

description.zh-cn: 长征途中，在红一、四方面军会师后，洪学智听从时任红四方面军领导人张国焘的命令南下。
description.en: During the Long March, after the First and Fourth Front Armies rendezvoused, Hong Xuezhi followed the orders of Zhang Guotao, then leader of the Fourth Front Army, to march south.

description.zh-cn: 1937年，洪学智在抗日军政大学被诬陷入狱，后由毛泽东亲自为其平反。
description.en: In 1937, Hong Xuezhi was falsely accused and imprisoned at the Counter-Japanese Military and Political University, and was later exonerated by Mao Zedong himself.

description.zh-cn: 1943年，洪学智接替阵亡的彭雄，担任新四军第三师参谋长。
description.en: In 1943, Hong Xuezhi succeeded Peng Xiong, who was killed in action, as the Chief of Staff of the 3rd Division of the New Fourth Army.

description.zh-cn: 1947年1月，洪学智被时任东北民主联军总司令林彪调往前线，担任第六纵队司令员。
description.en: In January 1947, Hong Xuezhi was transferred to the front line by Lin Biao, then Commander-in-Chief of the Northeast Democratic United Army, to serve as the commander of the 6th Column.

description.zh-cn: 平津战役期间，洪学智指挥其所率的第四十三军参与围困北平，促使傅作义率部接受和平改编。
description.en: During the Pingjin Campaign, Hong Xuezhi commanded the 43rd Army to participate in the siege of Beiping, which contributed to Fu Zuoyi's decision to lead his troops to accept a peaceful reorganization.

description.zh-cn: 1948年3月，洪学智调任上干大队大队长，由黄永胜接任第六纵队司令员。
description.en: In March 1948, Hong Xuezhi was transferred to be the head of the Senior Cadre Training Group, and Huang Yongsheng succeeded him as the commander of the 6th Column.

position.zh-cn: 中国人民志愿军副司令员
position.en: Deputy Commander of the Chinese People's Volunteer Army

description.zh-cn: 朝鲜战争期间，洪学智在中国人民志愿军司令员彭德怀的领导下担任副司令员。
description.en: During the Korean War, Hong Xuezhi served as Deputy Commander under the leadership of Peng Dehuai, the Commander of the Chinese People's Volunteer Army.

description.zh-cn: 洪学智长子洪虎曾任吉林省省长。
description.en: Hong Xuezhi's eldest son, Hong Hu, once served as the Governor of Jilin Province.

description.zh-cn: 洪虎于2004年10月卸任吉林省省长后，成为全国人大法律委员会副主任委员。
description.en: After stepping down as Governor of Jilin in October 2004, Hong Hu became the Vice Chairman of the Law Committee of the National People's Congress.

description.zh-cn: 洪学智次子洪豹曾任天津警备区副司令员。
description.en: Hong Xuezhi's second son, Hong Bao, once served as the Deputy Commander of the Tianjin Garrison.
